Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: '3:35 p.m., Command Central Office, Council Building'}
{2: '(Knock on door)', 3: '5'}
{3: 'You enter the office to see Hassen flipping through files at his desk.'}
{3: "...You notice Asimov's sloppy handwriting on some of the papers. Those must be the records from your previous failed simulation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Ah. Good afternoon, Gray Raven Commandant. Have you had a good rest these few days?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pretty good.', 3: '11', 4: 'Not good at all.', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You young people sure are energetic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You gotta be confident in yourself, young one! I trust that you'll be able to take on other jobs soon, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'd like to talk to you about your experience in simulated missions with Camu via remote connection and what you think about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll get straight to the point. The Council had a meeting over the data collected in your previous simulation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I have two things I'd like to discuss.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "First, the previous few simulated missions were indeed tougher—or, if I should say, they targeted Camu's weak spots especially. I'm sure you've noticed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah. You wanted to find out his limits.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It might seem cruel of us, but if we can't pinpoint and deal with the weak points during training, things would only get worse in a real battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I understand.', 3: '21', 4: "You're being too hard on him.", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We've adjusted the battle plans accordingly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'We want to make sure that Camu deserves to be on the team despite all the risks he brings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's why we want to reconfirm this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Commandant 【kuroname】, are you still willing to continue working with Camu in combat via remote M.I.N.D. connection?', 4: '1'}
{2: "He's an excellent fighter...", 3: '26'}
{2: 'And trustworthy.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...Is that your answer?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Before you leave, I have one more thing to say.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I made the right choice assigning him to you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Perhaps you'd like to hear HIS choice.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen simply smiles in his usual benevolent way and gestures at you to close the door when you leave.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'The corridor is empty. If your memory serves you, Camu should be in the office on the opposite side.'}
{3: 'You have just decided to wait when the office door opens.'}
{3: 'You are about to leave when the office door opens.'}
{3: 'Camu comes striding out. The mild annoyance on his face is replaced by a constrained expression.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'What did they say to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'They asked where you went last night.', 3: '46', 4: 'They asked if I wanted to keep working with you.', 5: '54'}
{3: 'Camu stares at you in suspicion.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'And what did you tell them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I said you were with me.'}
{2: 'Heh, just kidding.', 3: '56'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "That's what I thought.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu squints. Looks like he has already guessed the topic of your meeting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hey. What did you tell them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I declined, of course.', 3: '60', 4: 'I agreed, of course.', 5: '70'}
{3: "Camu freezes, as if not expecting such a direct answer. It's rare to see him so baffled."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...So you gave up on me, huh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Revolting. And you were spouting all those pretty words yesterday...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I was kidding.', 3: '64'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Do you really think I—uh, what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '...Hey! Are you ******* trying to die? Playing with me like that?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu looks genuinely enraged.'}
{2: 'My bad, my bad.', 3: '70', 4: 'I was just joking.', 5: '70'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "You won't find anyone better than me anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What did you choose, then?', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Is that important?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '74', 4: 'Just interested in your answer.', 5: '74'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Enough. I'm not falling for that again!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I already agreed to cooperate from the time being. I'd rather you hone your skills a bit instead of acting like my therapist.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can we train together again?', 3: '77', 4: 'Can we eat together again?', 5: '78'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Of course. I want to shut that creepy nerd up with an impressive performance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Of course. You owe me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'When did I ever owe you—forget it.', 3: '80'}
{2: "So I'll see you tomorrow in the training room, huh?", 3: '81'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "You'd better not be late. I hate waiting.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're the one who's always late...", 3: '84'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm not the one asking you to come, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll be on time.", 3: '86'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "You'd better be.", 4: '1'}
